meanings.definition: A condition characterized by excessive levels of insulin in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Hyperinsulinisms can lead to low blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed her with hyperinsulinisms after running blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The party had so much cake that it felt like a hyperinsulinisms of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of hormones, hyperinsulinisms stood out like a lighthouse.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was a buzz with talk of hyperinsulinisms after the biology lesson.

meanings.definition: The state of having an abnormally high concentration of insulin in the body.
meanings.sent1: Hyperinsulinisms can cause various health complications.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperinsulinisms required careful monitoring by the medical team.
meanings.sent3: The hyperinsulinisms in his body made him feel like a walking pharmacy.
